summary: The Stooges must battle alien spies to safeguard a goofy scientist's revolutionary new vehicle.
cast: Joe DeRita|Larry Fine|Moe Howard|Carol Christensen|Edson Stroll|Emil Sitka|George N. Neise|Rayford Barnes|Norman Leavitt|Nestor Paiva|Don Lamond|Peter Brocco|Thomas Glynn|Jean Charney|Peter Dawson|Maurice Manson|Duane Ament|Bill Dyer|Marjorie Eaton|Roy Engel|Cheerio Meredith|Jane Wald|Rusty Wescoatt
title: The Three Stooges in Orbit
